PSCT.Vegas:
3 Level 3 monsters
① If exactly 1 face-up "Mermail" monster you control is targeted by an opponent's attack, or Spell/Trap effect, 
that could have targeted this card (except during the Damage Step) (Quick): You can detach 1 Material from this card; 
that attack/effect targets this card, instead. 
② When this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: 
You can target 1 "Mermail" monster in your GY (except "Mermail Abysstrite"); Special Summon it.
